selections.name: Easily Bella Csj
selections.reason: Top Speed Figure (119) and Class (101). Won ALW77000 recently, indicating superior form over this field.

selections.name: Special D
selections.reason: Consistent Speed (111) and solid win record (3 wins in 8 starts). A reliable alternative.

selections.name: Shiny Nova
selections.reason: Speed Figure (118) is nearly equal to top pick. Gate-to-wire potential in a short sprint.

selections.name: Basking
selections.reason: Speed (113) fits well here. Outside post can be advantageous to avoid traffic in QH sprints.

danger_horse.name: Shiny Nova
danger_horse.reason: Possesses a 118 Speed Figure, just 1 point off the top pick. If #1 breaks poorly, #2 steals it.

selections.name: Evanderkeen
selections.reason: Highest Speed (105) in the field. Drops slightly in class feel and has the tactical speed to sit a good trip.

selections.name: Standard Of Proof
selections.reason: Speed (103) is competitive. Consistent runner at this level.

selections.name: Riding By
selections.reason: Speed (102). Rail draw allows for ground-saving trip. Good recent form.

selections.name: Quebrancho
selections.reason: Speed (98). A cut below the top three on figures but capable of hitting the board.

danger_horse.name: Standard Of Proof
danger_horse.reason: Very close on figures to the top pick and could turn the tables with a better trip.

selections.name: Port Ellen (Ire)
selections.reason: Massive Speed Figure advantage (110) vs field average (~98). Irish-breds often excel on US turf at this class level.

selections.name: Expressive Love
selections.reason: Speed (98). The morning line favorite (5/2). Consistent but lacks the explosive figure of the top pick.

selections.name: Dutton Street Girl
selections.reason: Speed (99). Solid contender for the exotics.

selections.name: Inxpress
selections.reason: Speed (100). Competitive figure puts her in the mix for minor awards.

selections.name: Little Trouble
selections.reason: Speed (105). Coming off a win. With the scratch of the favorite (#4), becomes the horse to beat.

selections.name: Winning Big
selections.reason: Speed (110). Highest speed figure in the race. Rail draw is the only concern if he gets pinned.

selections.name: Scratchy Apache
selections.reason: Speed (102). Consistent veteran who picks up pieces when pace collapses.

selections.name: El Diamante Negro
selections.reason: Speed (102). Outside post advantage.

danger_horse.name: Winning Big
danger_horse.reason: Actually has the highest speed figure (110) but inconsistent form patterns make him a risky win bet but dangerous threat.

selections.name: Aventapp
selections.reason: Speed (110). Highest speed figure and class (95). 7/2 odds offer great value over the favorite.

selections.name: Gypsy Lynn
selections.reason: Speed (104). The 5/2 favorite. Consistent but figures are lower than #8.

selections.name: Raven's Quest
selections.reason: Speed (101). Solid form, likely to stalk and pounce.

selections.name: Travelin Witch
selections.reason: Speed (105). Fast enough to win if the pace setup favors a closer.

danger_horse.name: Gypsy Lynn
danger_horse.reason: Rail speed bias could help this favorite hold off the closers.

selections.name: Tenth Street Don
selections.reason: Speed (107). Top speed figure in the field. Outside post is perfect for a stalking trip.

selections.name: Halo Uncle
selections.reason: Speed (105). The 5/2 favorite. Very logical contender based on class.

selections.name: Winter Falcon
selections.reason: Speed (105). Matches the favorite on figures. Rail draw is tricky.

selections.name: Hey Now
selections.reason: Speed (106). High speed figure at 5/1 makes him a live longshot.

danger_horse.name: Hey Now
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure (106) is superior to the favorite. Overlooked in the betting.

selections.name: Dr. Ray D.
selections.reason: Speed (108). Tied for top speed figure. Rail draw saves ground on the turf mile.

selections.name: Zisisit (ire)
selections.reason: Speed (108). Matches top pick. Irish breeding suggests stamina for the mile.

selections.name: Platinum Diva
selections.reason: Speed (106). Very consistent. Will be running late.

selections.name: Peak Earnings (gb)
selections.reason: Speed (103). Another Euro import that fits well here.

danger_horse.name: Zisisit (ire)
danger_horse.reason: Could easily win this if #1 gets trapped on the rail.

selections.name: More Trouble
selections.reason: Speed (95). The 3/1 favorite. Solid form and good post position.

selections.name: Lotsa Kitty
selections.reason: Speed (96). Highest speed figure in the race at 10/1 odds. Huge value play.

selections.name: Thebiggerthebetter
selections.reason: Speed (91). Consistent runner.

selections.name: Mo'o Lio
selections.reason: Speed (93). Competitive figure.

danger_horse.name: Lotsa Kitty
danger_horse.reason: Top speed figure (96) vs Favorite's (95), yet priced at 10/1. Must use.
